title: As Protests Rage, Iran Marks Anniversary of US Embassy Takeover
description: State-backed demonstrations to mark the 1979 event, a touchstone of the Iranian Revolution, were widely broadcast on TV and come as anti-government protests have rocked the country.
dc:creator: Cora Engelbrecht

media:description: A rally outside the former U.S. embassy in Tehran on Friday.
